name: Pingo's Levels!
description:
Welcome to a new adventure! This is a fun adventure game! You have your own assistant, Lily! She will help you learn anything that you want! Explore dimensions, magic, slime, life stories, bosses etc.

This game was made using RPG Game Maker MV.  Currently developing: Beta 1

To do:

  • Add more magic
  • Add more NPCs and life stories.
  • Add slimes
  • Add origins
  • Bosses
  • More in the future

Credits:

  • Jomarcenter-MJM - Copyright Text
  • Anton Uklein - Load command in the status menu
  • Yoji Ojima - Game Load Screen
  • Game Maker MV - Assets
